entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:48 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:48 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
